Params: {3: 'With a slash from Lucia, the last Corrupted in front of her falls as well.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've cleared the area. It's now safe to search.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'You reconvene after investigating for quite some time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Sorry... I didn't find any useful leads...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Same here. However, some projections appeared when I was looking for clues regarding the farewell letter.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Looks like two people read the full note. When they did, they cheered and went to the location to look for it.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The timestamp was too blurry to identify. Seems like it was a long time ago.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Even after all this time, there still hasn't been any news on how to control the Punishing Virus...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In other words, they may have run into danger, or it may have been completely useless information.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I saw a large number of scavengers devoured by the Red Tide.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'They seemed almost enthralled by it as if they were doing it willingly.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I only saw this brief moment. I don't have any other information.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We'll keep an eye out. Let's keep going, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
